text: Shamil Basayev (; 14 January 1965 - 10 July 2006) was a Muslim Chechen leader and warlord.Mosque and state During an attack in Ingushetia he was killed in Russia as he was planning a rush attack to Moscow in order to capture Kremlin.Fox News == References == Category:1965 births Category:2006 deaths Category:People from Chechnya Category:Islamist insurgents Category:Russian military people
title: Shamil Basayev
